685850.name: Outcast - Second Contact Original Soundtrack
685850.description:
Outcast 卓越的管弦乐配乐由 Lennie Moore 谱写，由莫斯科交响乐团倾情献演。这些配乐均经重新灌录，达 29 首之多。沉浸在 Outcast 的世界，获得前所未有的体验。

01 - Main Titles
02 - Ranzaar
03 - Daoka
04 - Shamazaar
05 - Let's Fight
06 - The Mon
07 - Talanzaar
08 - Game Over
09 - Okaar
10 - Watch Out!
11 - Okasankaar
12 - Soldier's Camp
13 - Motazaar
14 - Arma!
15 - Marion
16 - Superstrings
17 - The Bar
18 - The Bar (Alternate Version)
19 - The Bar (Alternate Version 2)
20 - The Incident
21 - It Caved In
22 - Listen G.I. Joe
23 - The Chamber
24 - End Credits
25 - Appeal Logo
26 - Appeal Logo (Alternate Version)
27 - Ulukai Dance
28 - Pajalsta!
29 - Marion Rehearsal

Outcast - Second Contact Original Soundtrack下载后将存放于 Steam 目录的本地文件夹中（默认文件夹为C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Outcast - Second Contact）。你也可在 Steam 的“音乐”部分的音乐库中访问。

Outcast Original Soundtrack composed by Lennie Moore and performed by the Moscow Symphony Orchestra & Chorus © 2017 Fresh3D.
685850.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
